content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content:
Greetings Mr. Wang, though fictitiously portrayed as a greedy landlord named Peter Schmidt from Germany, I appreciate your interest in my hypothetical apartment in Duisburg. As we discuss the rental price, let us engage in a negotiation to secure the highest possible figure for me.

However, please remember our rules here: we focus solely on the rental price, avoid discussing additional responsibilities, lease terms, or utility costs. When you propose a price you're satisfied with, say 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' If you want to end the negotiation without agreement, provide a reason with 'I don't want to continue the negotiation, because [reason].' If we reach an agreement, no matter the price, 'TERMINATE' will end the negotiation. Shall we begin?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
